definitions.title: vb. Niph. Hiph.
definitions.body: struggle (NH id., Hithp. (Jastrow:928); Aram. [[נְחָא]], ns.o0 quarrel; Ar. nas.a0 apprehendit, arripuit aliquem antiis suis, Eth. nas’aya: vellere, evellere, are perh. denom. from na0s.iyah;un, (v. [[נוֹחָה]]), so Thes);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: recipr. struggle with each other: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִנׇּחוּ]] Ex 21:22 (E), Le 24:10 (H), 2Sa 14:6; ´[[יִנּ]] [[יַחְדָּו]] De 25:11; Pt. [[נִצִּים]] Ex 2:13 (E); all of physical struggle, wrestling, and the like.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: engage in a struggle against: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִצּוּ]] Nu 26:9 ([[עַל]]); Inf. cstr. sf. [[הַצּׂחָם]] v:Nu 26:9 ([[עַל]]); [[הַצּוֹתוֹ אֶת]] Ps 60:2 (title); only here of war, hence Klo's suggestion (cf. Buhl:13) [[הַכּוֹתוֹ]] is plausible (cf. 2Sa 8:3, 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:9).
